title: Pixel 2 XL battery life awful (SOT) after A10 update
content:
As mentioned in the title, after upgrading to A10, Pixel 2 XL battery life is awful. I used to have 5-6 hours of SOT on Pie and now barely 3 hours, even with the dark theme enabled.
This is a shame. My device is just 10.5 months old.
